member.name: T:KclLibrary.CollisionImportSettings

member.summary: The max cube size of the root octrees.

member.summary: The min cube size of the root octrees.

member.summary: The max cube size of the all octrees.

member.summary: The min cube size of the all octrees.

member.summary: The max depth size of the all octrees.

member.name: F:KclLibrary.CollisionImportSettings.MaxTrianglesInCube
member.summary: The max amount of triangles in an octree. When the limit is reached, octrees will divide until the min cube size is reached.

member.summary: Determines the max distance of the normals for a prism.

member.summary: The min amount of padding to use for the collison boundings.
